001package org.jfree.chart.swing;
002
003
004import javax.swing.JMenuItem;
005import javax.swing.JPopupMenu;
006import javax.swing.JMenu;
007import java.awt.Dimension;
008import java.awt.Toolkit;
009import org.jfree.chart.ChartUtils;
010import org.jfree.chart.plot.Plot;
011import org.jfree.chart.plot.Zoomable;
012import java.io.Serializable;
013import org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart;
014
015public class ChartPanelProduct implements Serializable {
016        private JMenuItem zoomInBothMenuItem;
017        private JMenuItem zoomInDomainMenuItem;
018        private JMenuItem zoomInRangeMenuItem;
019        private JMenuItem zoomOutBothMenuItem;
020        private JMenuItem zoomOutDomainMenuItem;
021        private JMenuItem zoomOutRangeMenuItem;
022        private JMenuItem zoomResetBothMenuItem;
023        private JMenuItem zoomResetDomainMenuItem;
024        private JMenuItem zoomResetRangeMenuItem;
025
026        /**
027        * Creates a popup menu for the panel.  This method includes code that auto-detects JFreeSVG and OrsonPDF (via reflection) and, if they are present (and the  {@code  save}  argument is  {@code  true} , adds a menu item for each.
028        * @param properties   include a menu item for the chart property editor.
029        * @param copy  include a menu item for copying to the clipboard.
030        * @param save   include one or more menu items for saving the chart to supported image formats.
031        * @param print   include a menu item for printing the chart.
032        * @param zoom   include menu items for zooming.
033        * @return  The popup menu.
034        */
035        public JPopupMenu createPopupMenu(boolean properties, boolean copy, boolean save, boolean print, boolean zoom,
036                        ChartPanel chartPanel) {
037                JPopupMenu result = new JPopupMenu(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Chart") + ":");
038                boolean separator = false;
039                if (properties) {
040                        JMenuItem propertiesItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Properties..."));
041                        propertiesItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.PROPERTIES_COMMAND);
042                        propertiesItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
043                        result.add(propertiesItem);
044                        separator = true;
045                }
046                if (copy) {
047                        if (separator) {
048                                result.addSeparator();
049                        }
050                        JMenuItem copyItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Copy"));
051                        copyItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.COPY_COMMAND);
052                        copyItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
053                        result.add(copyItem);
054                        separator = !save;
055                }
056                if (save) {
057                        if (separator) {
058                                result.addSeparator();
059                        }
060                        JMenu saveSubMenu = new JMenu(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Save_as"));
061                        {
062                                JMenuItem pngItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("PNG..."));
063                                pngItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.SAVE_AS_PNG_COMMAND);
064                                pngItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
065                                saveSubMenu.add(pngItem);
066                        }
067                        {
068                                final Dimension ss = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getScreenSize();
069                                final String pngName = "PNG (" + ss.width + "x" + ss.height + ") ...";
070                                JMenuItem pngItem = new JMenuItem(pngName);
071                                pngItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.SAVE_AS_PNG_SIZE_COMMAND);
072                                pngItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
073                                saveSubMenu.add(pngItem);
074                        }
075                        if (ChartUtils.isJFreeSVGAvailable()) {
076                                JMenuItem svgItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("SVG..."));
077                                svgItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.SAVE_AS_SVG_COMMAND);
078                                svgItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
079                                saveSubMenu.add(svgItem);
080                        }
081                        if (ChartUtils.isOrsonPDFAvailable()) {
082                                JMenuItem pdfItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("PDF..."));
083                                pdfItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.SAVE_AS_PDF_COMMAND);
084                                pdfItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
085                                saveSubMenu.add(pdfItem);
086                        }
087                        result.add(saveSubMenu);
088                        separator = true;
089                }
090                if (print) {
091                        if (separator) {
092                                result.addSeparator();
093                        }
094                        JMenuItem printItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Print..."));
095                        printItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.PRINT_COMMAND);
096                        printItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
097                        result.add(printItem);
098                        separator = true;
099                }
100                if (zoom) {
101                        if (separator) {
102                                result.addSeparator();
103                        }
104                        JMenu zoomInMenu = new JMenu(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Zoom_In"));
105                        this.zoomInBothMenuItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("All_Axes"));
106                        this.zoomInBothMenuItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.ZOOM_IN_BOTH_COMMAND);
107                        this.zoomInBothMenuItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
108                        zoomInMenu.add(this.zoomInBothMenuItem);
109                        zoomInMenu.addSeparator();
110                        this.zoomInDomainMenuItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Domain_Axis"));
111                        this.zoomInDomainMenuItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.ZOOM_IN_DOMAIN_COMMAND);
112                        this.zoomInDomainMenuItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
113                        zoomInMenu.add(this.zoomInDomainMenuItem);
114                        this.zoomInRangeMenuItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Range_Axis"));
115                        this.zoomInRangeMenuItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.ZOOM_IN_RANGE_COMMAND);
116                        this.zoomInRangeMenuItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
117                        zoomInMenu.add(this.zoomInRangeMenuItem);
118                        result.add(zoomInMenu);
119                        JMenu zoomOutMenu = new JMenu(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Zoom_Out"));
120                        this.zoomOutBothMenuItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("All_Axes"));
121                        this.zoomOutBothMenuItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.ZOOM_OUT_BOTH_COMMAND);
122                        this.zoomOutBothMenuItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
123                        zoomOutMenu.add(this.zoomOutBothMenuItem);
124                        zoomOutMenu.addSeparator();
125                        this.zoomOutDomainMenuItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Domain_Axis"));
126                        this.zoomOutDomainMenuItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.ZOOM_OUT_DOMAIN_COMMAND);
127                        this.zoomOutDomainMenuItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
128                        zoomOutMenu.add(this.zoomOutDomainMenuItem);
129                        this.zoomOutRangeMenuItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Range_Axis"));
130                        this.zoomOutRangeMenuItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.ZOOM_OUT_RANGE_COMMAND);
131                        this.zoomOutRangeMenuItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
132                        zoomOutMenu.add(this.zoomOutRangeMenuItem);
133                        result.add(zoomOutMenu);
134                        JMenu autoRangeMenu = new JMenu(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Auto_Range"));
135                        this.zoomResetBothMenuItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("All_Axes"));
136                        this.zoomResetBothMenuItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.ZOOM_RESET_BOTH_COMMAND);
137                        this.zoomResetBothMenuItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
138                        autoRangeMenu.add(this.zoomResetBothMenuItem);
139                        autoRangeMenu.addSeparator();
140                        this.zoomResetDomainMenuItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Domain_Axis"));
141                        this.zoomResetDomainMenuItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.ZOOM_RESET_DOMAIN_COMMAND);
142                        this.zoomResetDomainMenuItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
143                        autoRangeMenu.add(this.zoomResetDomainMenuItem);
144                        this.zoomResetRangeMenuItem = new JMenuItem(ChartPanel.localizationResources.getString("Range_Axis"));
145                        this.zoomResetRangeMenuItem.setActionCommand(ChartPanel.ZOOM_RESET_RANGE_COMMAND);
146                        this.zoomResetRangeMenuItem.addActionListener(chartPanel);
147                        autoRangeMenu.add(this.zoomResetRangeMenuItem);
148                        result.addSeparator();
149                        result.add(autoRangeMenu);
150                }
151                return result;
152        }
153
154        /**
155        * The idea is to modify the zooming options depending on the type of chart being displayed by the panel.
156        * @param x   horizontal position of the popup.
157        * @param y   vertical position of the popup.
158        */
159        public void displayPopupMenu(int x, int y, JPopupMenu thisPopup, JFreeChart thisChart, ChartPanel chartPanel) {
160                if (thisPopup == null) {
161                        return;
162                }
163                boolean isDomainZoomable = false;
164                boolean isRangeZoomable = false;
165                Plot plot = (thisChart != null ? thisChart.getPlot() : null);
166                if (plot instanceof Zoomable) {
167                        Zoomable z = (Zoomable) plot;
168                        isDomainZoomable = z.isDomainZoomable();
169                        isRangeZoomable = z.isRangeZoomable();
170                }
171                if (this.zoomInDomainMenuItem != null) {
172                        this.zoomInDomainMenuItem.setEnabled(isDomainZoomable);
173                }
174                if (this.zoomOutDomainMenuItem != null) {
175                        this.zoomOutDomainMenuItem.setEnabled(isDomainZoomable);
176                }
177                if (this.zoomResetDomainMenuItem != null) {
178                        this.zoomResetDomainMenuItem.setEnabled(isDomainZoomable);
179                }
180                if (this.zoomInRangeMenuItem != null) {
181                        this.zoomInRangeMenuItem.setEnabled(isRangeZoomable);
182                }
183                if (this.zoomOutRangeMenuItem != null) {
184                        this.zoomOutRangeMenuItem.setEnabled(isRangeZoomable);
185                }
186                if (this.zoomResetRangeMenuItem != null) {
187                        this.zoomResetRangeMenuItem.setEnabled(isRangeZoomable);
188                }
189                if (this.zoomInBothMenuItem != null) {
190                        this.zoomInBothMenuItem.setEnabled(isDomainZoomable && isRangeZoomable);
191                }
192                if (this.zoomOutBothMenuItem != null) {
193                        this.zoomOutBothMenuItem.setEnabled(isDomainZoomable && isRangeZoomable);
194                }
195                if (this.zoomResetBothMenuItem != null) {
196                        this.zoomResetBothMenuItem.setEnabled(isDomainZoomable && isRangeZoomable);
197                }
198                thisPopup.show(chartPanel, x, y);
199        }
200}
